title: Gov. Deal honors grandparents and relatives for keeping kids connected to their communities and out ...
text: ( Source : Georgia Department of Human Services ) ATLANTA - Gov. Nathan Deal today joined Georgia's Human Services Commissioner Robyn A. Crittenden and Family and Children Services Director Bobby Cagle to honor more than 250,000 grandparents
